sentences.en: At last Jack began to hanker after a little excitement.
sentences.cn: 后来,杰克又渴望找点儿刺激了.

sentences.en: But no , they won't. They still hanker after what they know is gone.
sentences.cn: 他不, 他也晓得那边空了,但是还是想那个东西.

sentences.en: Firework was first played to dispel ghosts and evil and hanker for auspiciousness and happiness.
sentences.cn: 燃放爆竹的风俗最早起因于驱鬼除邪,祈求一年的吉祥顺利.

sentences.en: Firework was first played to dispel ghosts and evil spirits and hanker for auspiciousness and happiness.
sentences.cn: 燃放爆竹风俗最早起因于驱鬼除邪,祈求一年的吉祥顺利.

sentences.en: For those who hanker after extraterrestrial life that is a pity.
sentences.cn: 这对那些热衷外星生物的人来说或多或少有些遗憾.

sentences.en: I don't hanker after squirrel meat.
I hanker after a corner because It'serves to bring calmness to my mind.
sentences.cn: 我追求角落,因为它给我的心灵带来平静.

sentences.en: I hankered after a floor-length brown suede coat.
sentences.cn: 我渴望一件垂地长度的棕色麂皮大衣。

sentences.en: If you hanker for the great outdoors, it would be hard to beat Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 如果你对户外的极致景色心驰神往, 那么瑞士就是最佳之选.

sentences.en: Only lazybones and mediocre persons could hanker after the days of messing together.
sentences.cn: 只有懒汉庸才才会留恋那大锅饭的年代.

sentences.en: Personality: what you like? what is your hobby? hanker for it.
sentences.cn: 个性: 你喜欢 什么 ?爱好什么? 追求就是了!

sentences.en: Sometimes they, they just, uh, hanker for a little competition.
sentences.cn: 有时候他们就是喜欢来点竞争.

sentences.en: They are able to hanker, someone was abandon, someone was hanker at last.
sentences.cn: 会不断地有人追求, 有人会中途放弃, 有人会一直追到最后.

trans.tran_en: If you hanker after something, you want it very much
